languages.text: "Я шла своим Путем", {n}— Ирлиэт произносит фразу почти нараспев, наполняя каждое слово сакральным смыслом.{/n} — "Знаешь ли ты, что такое Путь для {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g}? Это больше, чем просто избранное — как вы это называете — ремесло. Путь — это то, как каждый из нас движется по лабиринту существования — внутри и снаружи, в душе и в жизни. Это не только дорога, но и крепость. Он защищает нас от {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Той, Что Жаждет{/g} — сбейся с Пути, и угодишь в ее темные объятья".

traits.locale_text: "Я шла своим Путем", {n}— Ирлиэт произносит фразу почти нараспев, наполняя каждое слово сакральным смыслом.{/n} — "Знаешь ли ты, что такое Путь для {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g}? Это больше, чем просто избранное — как вы это называете — ремесло. Путь — это то, как каждый из нас движется по лабиринту существования — внутри и снаружи, в душе и в жизни. Это не только дорога, но и крепость. Он защищает нас от {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Той, Что Жаждет{/g} — сбейся с Пути, и угодишь в ее темные объятья".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I followed my Path," {n}Yrliet almost chants, each word full of sacred meaning.{/n} "Do you know what a Path is to the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}? It is more than a chosen — what do you call it? — craft. The Path is how each of us moves through the labyrinth of existence, inside and out, in life and in spirit. It is both a journey and a fortress. It protects us from {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} — to stray from the Path is to fall into her dark embrace."
languages.original_text: "Я шла своим Путем", {n}— Ирлиэт произносит фразу почти нараспев, наполняя каждое слово сакральным смыслом.{/n} — "Знаешь ли ты, что такое Путь для {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g}? traits.locale_text: "I followed my Path", {n}— Yrliet is almost chanting, each word full of sacred meaning.{/n} — "Do you know what a Path is to the children of Asuryan? It is more than a chosen — what do you call it? — craft. The Path is how each of us moves through the labyrinth of existence, inside and outside, in life and in spirit. It is both a journey and a fortress. It protects us from She Who Thirsts— to stray from the Path is to fall into her dark embrace."

languages.text: “我遵循着我的道途。”{n}伊莉耶特几乎是在吟唱，每个字都充满了神圣的意义。{/n}“你知道，对{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}而言道途意味着什么吗？它不仅仅是你选择的……你们是怎么称呼来着？噢，职业。在无数世界的迷宫之中，道途就是我们前进的方式，从内到外，从肉体到精神。它既是一场旅程，又是一座要塞。它可以保护我们免受{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}饥渴女士{/g}的伤害，一旦偏离道途，就会落入她黑暗的怀抱。”
languages.original_text: "I followed my Path," {n}Yrliet almost chants, each word full of sacred meaning.{/n} "Do you know what a Path is to the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}? It is more than a chosen — what do you call it? — craft. The Path is how each of us moves through the labyrinth of existence, inside and out, in life and in spirit. It is both a journey and a fortress. It protects us from {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} — to stray from the Path is to fall into her dark embrace."

traits.locale_text: “我遵循着我的道途。”{n}伊莉耶特几乎是在吟唱，每个字都充满了神圣的意义。{/n}“你知道，对{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}而言道途意味着什么吗？它不仅仅是你选择的……你们是怎么称呼来着？噢，职业。在无数世界的迷宫之中，道途就是我们前进的方式，从内到外，从肉体到精神。它既是一场旅程，又是一座要塞。它可以保护我们免受{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}饥渴女士{/g}的伤害，一旦偏离道途，就会落入她黑暗的怀抱。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "I followed my Path," {n}Yrliet almost chants, each word full of sacred meaning.{/n} "Do you know what a Path is to the Children of Asuryan? It is more than a chosen — what do you call it? — craft. The Path is how each of us moves through the labyrinth of existence, inside and out, in life and in spirit. It is both a journey and a fortress. It protects us from She Who Thirsts — to stray from the Path is to fall into her dark embrace."

languages.text: «Seguí mi Senda». {n}Yrliet casi recita las palabras, todas ellas cargadas de un significado sagrado.{/n} «¿Sabes lo que es una Senda para los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g}? Es más que una... ¿cómo lo llamáis? Profesión. La Senda es nuestra forma de recorrer el laberinto de la existencia, por dentro y por fuera, en vida y en espíritu. Es tanto un viaje como una fortaleza. Nos protege de {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}la Sedienta{/g}. Desviarse de la Senda es caer en sus oscuras manos».
languages.original_text: "I followed my Path," {n}Yrliet almost chants, each word full of sacred meaning.{/n} "Do you know what a Path is to the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}? It is more than a chosen — what do you call it? — craft. The Path is how each of us moves through the labyrinth of existence, inside and out, in life and in spirit. It is both a journey and a fortress. It protects us from {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} — to stray from the Path is to fall into her dark embrace."

traits.locale_text: «Seguí mi Senda». {n}Yrliet casi recita las palabras, todas ellas cargadas de un significado sagrado.{/n} «¿Sabes lo que es una Senda para los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g}? Es más que una... ¿cómo lo llamáis? Profesión. La Senda es nuestra forma de recorrer el laberinto de la existencia, por dentro y por fuera, en vida y en espíritu. Es tanto un viaje como una fortaleza. Nos protege de {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}la Sedienta{/g}. Desviarse de la Senda es caer en sus oscuras manos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我は己の道を歩んだ」{n}ユリエットの声はまるで祝詞のようであり、その一言一言に神聖な意味がこめられていた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}にとっての『道』が何か、知っているか？それは選ばれる以上のものだ。お前たちはなんと呼んでいた？…工芸だ。道とは、我ら一人一人が、存在の迷宮の中を、内と外、生と精神の中を、どのように進んでいくかということなのだ。それは旅であり、要塞でもある。それは{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}かの渇きたる女{/g}から我らを守る。道から外れることは、彼女の暗い抱擁の中に落ちることなのだ」
languages.original_text: "I followed my Path," {n}Yrliet almost chants, each word full of sacred meaning.{/n} "Do you know what a Path is to the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}? It is more than a chosen — what do you call it? — craft. The Path is how each of us moves through the labyrinth of existence, inside and out, in life and in spirit. It is both a journey and a fortress. It protects us from {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} — to stray from the Path is to fall into her dark embrace."

traits.locale_text: 「我は己の道を歩んだ」{n}ユリエットの声はまるで祝詞のようであり、その一言一言に神聖な意味がこめられていた。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子ら{/g}にとっての『道』が何か、知っているか？それは選ばれる以上のものだ。お前たちはなんと呼んでいた？…工芸だ。道とは、我ら一人一人が、存在の迷宮の中を、内と外、生と精神の中を、どのように進んでいくかということなのだ。それは旅であり、要塞でもある。それは{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}かの渇きたる女{/g}から我らを守る。道から外れることは、彼女の暗い抱擁の中に落ちることなのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin meinem Pfad gefolgt"{n}, skandiert Yrliet fast, jedes Wort voll heiliger Bedeutung.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, was ein Pfad für die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} bedeutet? Es ist mehr als ein erwähltes — wie nennt Ihr das? — ein Handwerk. Der Pfad bestimmt, wie der Einzelne sich durch das Labyrinth der Existenz bewegt, innen wie außen, im Leben wie im Geist. Er ist sowohl eine Reise als auch eine Festung. Er beschützt uns vor {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Ihr, die dürstet{/g}. Vom Pfad abzuweichen heißt in ihre dunkle Umarmung zu fallen."
languages.original_text: "I followed my Path," {n}Yrliet almost chants, each word full of sacred meaning.{/n} "Do you know what a Path is to the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}? It is more than a chosen — what do you call it? — craft. The Path is how each of us moves through the labyrinth of existence, inside and out, in life and in spirit. It is both a journey and a fortress. It protects us from {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} — to stray from the Path is to fall into her dark embrace."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin meinem Pfad gefolgt"{n}, skandiert Yrliet fast, jedes Wort voll heiliger Bedeutung.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, was ein Pfad für die {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} bedeutet? Es ist mehr als ein erwähltes — wie nennt Ihr das? — ein Handwerk. Der Pfad bestimmt, wie der Einzelne sich durch das Labyrinth der Existenz bewegt, innen wie außen, im Leben wie im Geist. Er ist sowohl eine Reise als auch eine Festung. Er beschützt uns vor {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Ihr, die dürstet{/g}. Vom Pfad abzuweichen heißt in ihre dunkle Umarmung zu fallen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je suivais ma Voie. » {n}Yrliet semble presque psalmodier, comme si chaque mot était imprégné d'une signification sacrée.{/n} « Savez-vous ce qu'une Voie représente pour les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} ? C'est plus que... Quel est le terme que vous employez, déjà ? Ah, oui. La Voie est plus qu'une vocation. C'est la façon dont chacun de nous traverse le labyrinthe de l'existence, à l'intérieur comme à l'extérieur, dans la vie et par l'esprit. C'est à la fois un voyage et une forteresse, car elle nous protège de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Assoiffée{/g}, qui attire dans sa sombre étreinte quiconque s'éloigne de sa Voie. »
languages.original_text: "I followed my Path," {n}Yrliet almost chants, each word full of sacred meaning.{/n} "Do you know what a Path is to the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}? It is more than a chosen — what do you call it? — craft. The Path is how each of us moves through the labyrinth of existence, inside and out, in life and in spirit. It is both a journey and a fortress. It protects us from {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} — to stray from the Path is to fall into her dark embrace."

traits.locale_text: « Je suivais ma Voie. » {n}Yrliet semble presque psalmodier, comme si chaque mot était imprégné d'une signification sacrée.{/n} « Savez-vous ce qu'une Voie représente pour les {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} ? C'est plus que... Quel est le terme que vous employez, déjà ? Ah, oui. La Voie est plus qu'une vocation. C'est la façon dont chacun de nous traverse le labyrinthe de l'existence, à l'intérieur comme à l'extérieur, dans la vie et par l'esprit. C'est à la fois un voyage et une forteresse, car elle nous protège de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Assoiffée{/g}, qui attire dans sa sombre étreinte quiconque s'éloigne de sa Voie. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yolumu izledim." {n}Yrliet, âdeta ilahi söyler gibi konuşuyor. Her kelimesinde saklı bir mana yatıyor.{/n} "Yolun, {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nın{/g} gözündeki anlamını bilir misin? O, seçtiğin... Kelimeyi hatırlayamadım. Hah, seçtiğin bir zanaatın çok ötesindedir. Her birimiz; hem içimizdeki hem de dışımızdaki, hem hayatımızdaki hem de ruhumuzdaki varlığın labirentinde Yol sayesinde ilerleriz. Yol bizi {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Susayan'dan{/g} korur. Yoldan sapmaksa onun karanlığına kucak açmaktır."
languages.original_text: "I followed my Path," {n}Yrliet almost chants, each word full of sacred meaning.{/n} "Do you know what a Path is to the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g}? It is more than a chosen — what do you call it? — craft. The Path is how each of us moves through the labyrinth of existence, inside and out, in life and in spirit. It is both a journey and a fortress. It protects us from {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}She Who Thirsts{/g} — to stray from the Path is to fall into her dark embrace."

traits.locale_text: "Yolumu izledim." {n}Yrliet, âdeta ilahi söyler gibi konuşuyor. Her kelimesinde saklı bir mana yatıyor.{/n} "Yolun {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları{/g}'nın gözündeki anlamını bilir misin? O, seçtiğin... Kelimeyi hatırlayamadım. Tamam, seçtiğin bir zanaatın çok ötesindedir. Her birimiz, hem içimizdeki hem de dışımızdaki, hem hayatımızdaki hem de ruhumuzdaki varlığın labirentinde Yol sayesinde ilerleriz. Yol, bizi {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Susayan{/g}'dan korur. Yoldan sapmaksa onun karanlığına kucak açmaktır."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
